heroSection.description: Building apps, refactoring systems & adaptive AI-driven experiences

about.description: Software Engineer experienced in Flutter, Next.js, TypeScript, and Python. I focus on building scalable apps, optimizing performance, and exploring AI/ML to create adaptive, user-focused solutions.

extended.journey: Started with curiosity for how things work, now I build apps that scale and delight users.
extended.passion: Excited about blending software engineering with AI/ML to solve real-world problems.
extended.lifestyle: Outside work, I explore new tech, play piano, and share knowledge.

achievements: Shipped Smart Tips feature leading to 10% increase in user engagement
Built custom Flutter plugin for multi-card payments with HyperSDK integration
Refactored 40K+ lines of legacy code to Clean Architecture (3× faster load times)
Optimized client tracking by removing 100+ duplicate clickstreams
Migrated MariaDB → PostgreSQL (40% faster analytics queries)
Built Next.js + Zustand app for user & group management
Delivered responsive dashboard with MaterialUI & integrated reports
Added multi-level RBAC with NextAuth & JWT

education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: Thrive
projects.description: AI-based adaptive narrative application for dynamic storytelling
projects.longDescription: Thrive is a storytelling engine built for Serious Games using Gemini (fine-tuned) with RAG pipelines to generate dynamic, choice-driven plots. It supports branching narratives with rollback and alternate paths through a graph-based progression system powered by Neo4J. The platform combines Flutter for cross-platform delivery with Vertex AI and a robust backend stack, enabling adaptive, immersive storytelling experiences.
achievements: Built a storytelling engine using Gemini + RAG for adaptive narratives
Implemented graph-based story progression with Neo4J
Enabled rollback and alternate story paths for dynamic storytelling

projects.title: Online KYC Verification Portal
projects.description: Real-time video KYC system with document and conversational verification
projects.longDescription: Developed during a 48-hour hackathon in a team of 3, this portal enables real-time video KYC with support for document capture and conversational verification workflows. It leverages WebRTC for secure video streams, Next.js for the frontend, and PostgreSQL for data storage, while integrating LangChain for conversational AI assistance.
achievements: Delivered functional prototype in 48 hours during a hackathon
Implemented real-time video KYC with document verification
Built conversational verification workflows powered by LangChain
